name: The Ever-Full Flask 🥤
description: Thy cup shall never run dry! Thou dost remember to hydrate more frequently!

name: The Cozy Cloak of Softness 🧣
description: Thy sensory needs are met! Thou dost gain comfort & warmth bonuses for deep relaxation.

name: The Weighted Blanket of Tranquility 🛏
description: Thine anxieties are eased! Thou shalt fall asleep more swiftly and rest more deeply.

name: The Lavender Satchel of Peace 🌸
description: Repels stress! Thou dost gain a resistance against distractions & sensory overload!

name: The Satchel of Perpetual Order 🎒
description: Reduces clutter! Next organizational task takes half the effort.

name: The Starlit Headphones 🎧
description: Protects thee from auditory distractions! Focus tasks are less likely to be interrupted!

name: The Cozy Cocoon Socks 🧦
description: Feet are warm, mind is at peace! Sitting still during study sessions becomes twice as easy.
